title: Lazada Product Sponsored Affiliate Report
description: Daily and monthly performance report for a Lazada Product Sponsored Affiliate

Date.description: Date of the report in the format 'DD-MM-YYYY', e.g., '11-10-2023'

Item_Id.description: Unique identifier for the product item, e.g., 167487482

Product_Name.description: Name of the product, e.g., 'Joie Juva Infant Car Seat Group 0+ (for Newborn Babies up to 13kgs) - Black Ink infant car seat carrier'

Brand_Id.description: Unique identifier for the brand, e.g., 58293

Category_Id.description: Unique identifier for the category, e.g., 18444

Orders.description: Total number of orders for the product

Units_Sold.description: Total number of units sold for the product

Est_ROAS.description: Estimated Return on Ad Spend (ROAS) for the product
